name: Anxiety OKAY
description:
This was made for Porpentine's Twiny Jam. It has exactly 300 words if you look at the story statistics in Twine.

Unfortunately, you need to have a mousy-pointer thing to get the full effect of the game. Tablets and mobile devices are not so good with this game. The code that handles the gimmick of the game is a little wonky, so be patient with it please.

Be patient with yourself too. You deserve it.
